item.title: Object clicking issues
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

Ok, so I’m trying to write a small code for woodcutting, and I made a timer, but everytime I press a tree nothing happens. This is what I have for the object

if (objectID == 1315 || objectID == 1316 || objectID == 1318 || objectID == 1276 || objectID == 1319){ if (playerHasItem(1349)){ setAnimation(875); 
		addItem(1511, 1);
		addSkillXP(500, 8);
		resetAnimation();
		resetWC();
		}
		}</blockquote>

Can anyone tell me why this wouldn’t work? It doesn’t give me any errors…

Read full topic
